verbose_text: When Bowie et al. XREF_BIBR carried out a glucose + galactose tolerance test and a lactose tolerance test in 3 malnourished children whose diarrhea had been controlled by a carbohydrate-free diet, lactose administration produced a much lower plasma glucose increment than a glucose + galactose bolus.
